name: gurinder-singh-resume
description: A comprehensive collection of professional resume formats showcasing my experience as a Staff iOS & AI/ML Engineer.

scripts.icons:verify: node -e "const { verifyIcons } = require('./scripts/icon-utils'); const r = verifyIcons(); console.log('✅ Found:', r.found, '❌ Missing:', r.missing);"
scripts.icons:list: node -e "const { listAllIcons } = require('./scripts/icon-utils'); const all = listAllIcons(); Object.keys(all).forEach(cat => console.log(cat + ':', all[cat].local.length + all[cat].external.length, 'icons'));"
